synopsis.text:
Lupin's newest adventure unfolds as the dashing thief sets out to rescue the captivated Rebecca Rossellini, a stunning businesswoman and model who graces the 2015 Lupin III TV anime series. Set in Italy and San Marino, the story weaves together various plotlines from episodes such as 'The Marriage of Lupin III', '0.2% Chance of Survival', and the DVD/Blu-ray exclusive 'Non-Stop Rendezvous'.

In addition to the rescue mission, Lupin receives an enigmatic challenge from a mysterious figure known as 'The Masked Count'. The challenge? A race to uncover the elusive 'inheritance of Count Cagliostro' before the other. With Rebecca's secret and independence adding depth to the story, this thrilling special invites viewers to join Lupin on a journey filled with intrigue and excitement.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
